alert.note: Alert for Caswell; Rockingham (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:42PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Rockingham, Caswell and southwestern Halifax Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 542 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cluster Springs to 6 miles southwest of Monroeton. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Reidsville... Yanceyville... Bethel... Jericho... Turbeville... Camp Springs... and Providence. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
